lead_paragraph: Hazeltine National, this week's Ryder Cup venue, is a true test and a better layout than it was in 1970 when Tony Jacklin shook up the golfing world by becoming the first British winner of the U.S. Open in 50 years.

headline.print_headline: Jacklin Expecting Fireworks at Scene of 1970 Win
headline.main: Jacklin Expecting Fireworks at Scene of 1970 Win
